original_text: He had been instructed in the way of the Lord. And being fervent in spirit, he spoke and taught accurately the things concerning Jesus, though he knew only the baptism of John.
korean_text: 그가 일찍이 주의 도를 배워 열심으로 예수에 관한 것을 자세히 말하며 가르치나 요한의 세례만 알 따름이라

sentences.original_text: He had been instructed in the way of the Lord.
he spoke and taught accurately the things concerning Jesus,
sentences.korean_translation: 예수에 관한 것들을 정확히 말하고 가르쳤다,

sentences.original_text: though he knew only the baptism of John.
